name: DCDevice
desc: A representation of a device that provides a unique, authenticated token.

items.name: class var current: DCDevice
items.desc: A representation of the device for which you want to query the two bits of data.

items.name: var isSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports the DeviceCheck API.

items.name: func generateToken(completionHandler: (Data?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Generates a token that identifies the current device.
